p.d: Ludivine, Andri, Alessia and Nando will be spending a year living as part of a new family. Until then, they'd been pampered by their parents. Today, they have to watch over the kids, calm a crying baby, do the housework, make new friends... Nothing but challenges for the four teenagers! Directed by: Selina Beeri, Janine Bleuler (Switzerland, 2018)
